link.title: Argyle Independent School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: Argyle Independent School District is a public school district based in Argyle, Texas, recognized for high academic and athletic performance, and a strong community-based culture. 800 Eagle Drive, Argyle, TX 76226 | 940-464-7241

div.marquee: Argyle ISD will be closed through the end of the school year - Online learning will continue.

div.p: Football State Champions: 2013. Finalists in 2005, 2011, 2014, 2015, and 2016
UIL Cheer Spirit Division: State Finalists 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, State Champions in Crowd Leading 2019
State Champion Honor Band: 2004, 2008, and Midwest International Performer 2009
Texas Bandmasters "Texas Outstanding HS Band Program Award" 2014
